page.title: 15A Typical Farmer
page.content: Mr.stokes is a local farmer.He lives at Wigmore Farm.He has a wife and 3 children . He has 217 acres. He gets up at 6 o'clock in the morning and he milks his cows 3 times a day in the winter and 2 times in the summer.He likes Fords 4 wheel drive tractors but they are not suitable for his farm .He grows grass corn and fodder beet. He has got 1 farm and 2 pig units. One pig unit is just 4 sheds at the farm and one is out of the square. He likes farming because it's the only thing he can do .He has got 120 cows and 3000 pigs .He has 6 full time workers.He gets 2000 litres of milk a day usually but he can get 3000.
